channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Consumer confidence rebounds slightly in July on easing inflation fears and higher stock prices
item.description: “Consumers are rattled,” one analyst noted, “and rattled consumers spend less than confident consumers.”
